info.title: Teku
info.description: A minimal API specification for the beacon node, which enables a validator to connect and perform its obligations on the Ethereum 2.0 phase 0 beacon chain.

put.summary: Changes the log level without restarting.
put.description: Changes the log level without restarting. You can change the log level for all logs, or the log level for specific packages or classes.

204.description: The LogLevel was accepted and applied

get.summary: Get the beacon chain block matching the criteria.
get.description: Returns the beacon chain block that matches the specified epoch, slot, or block root.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UnsignedLong` Slot to query in the canonical chain.

get.summary: Get information about the chain head.
get.description: Returns information about the head of the beacon chain including the finalized and justified information.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get information about the chain head.
get.description:
Returns information about the head of the beacon chain from the node’s perspective.

To retrieve finalized and justified information, use /beacon/chainhead instead.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the committee assignments for an epoch.
get.description: Returns committee assignments for each slot in a specified epoch.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the beacon chain state matching the criteria.
get.description: Returns the beacon chain state that matches the specified slot or block root.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UnsignedLong` Slot to query in the canonical chain.

404.description: The beacon state matching the supplied query parameter was not found.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the beacon chain state root for the specified slot.
get.description: Returns the beacon chain state root for the specified slot.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UnsignedLong` Slot to query in the canonical chain.

200.description: The beacon chain `state_root`(`Bytes32`) for the specified slot.

404.description: The beacon state root matching the supplied parameter was not found.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get validators matching the specified query.
get.description:
Returns validator information.

Returns the first page of validators in the current epoch if you do not specify any parameters.

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: `UnsignedLong` Epoch number to query. Defaults to the current epoch.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
Only return validators that are active in the specified `epoch`. By default, returns inactive and active validators.

**Note**: The field accepts any value to return active validators.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: `Integer` The amount of results to return per page. Defaults to 250 results.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: `Integer` Page number to return. Defaults to page 0.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

post.summary: Get validators matching specified public keys.
post.description:
Returns information about validators that match the list of validator public keys and optional epoch.

If no epoch is specified, the validators are queried from the current state.

Public keys that do not match a validator are returned without validator information.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the listening ENR address of the node.
get.description: Returns the beacon node's listening Ethereum Node Record (ENR) address.

200.description: Base64-encoded ENR or an empty string if Node Discovery Protocol v5 is not used.

get.summary: Get the addresses the client's libp2p service is listening on.
get.description: Returns the list of addresses that the client's libp2p service is listening on.
Returns the beacon node's base58-encoded PeerId.

get.summary: Get the PeerIds of connected peers.
get.description: Returns the base58-encoded PeerId of each peer connected to the beacon node.

get.summary: Get the number of connected peers.
get.description: Returns the number of peers connected to the beacon node.

200.description: Number of peers connected to the beacon node.

get.summary: Get the TCP listening port of the client's libp2p service.
get.description: Returns the TCP listening port of the client's libp2p service.

get.summary: Get the fork of the current head.
get.description: Returns information about the fork of the beacon chain head from the node’s perspective.

200.description: An object containing the fork of the current head.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.description: Returns the genesis time from the beacon node.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.description: Returns an object with data about the synchronization status, or false if not synchronizing.

get.summary: Get an unsigned attestation for a slot from the current state.
get.description:
Returns an unsigned attestation for the block at the specified non-finalized slot.

This endpoint is not protected against slashing. Signing the returned attestation can result in a slashable offence.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UnsignedLong` Non-finalized slot for which to create the attestation.

parameters.name: committee_index
parameters.description: `Integer` Index of the committee making the attestation.

200.description: Returns an attestation object with a blank signature. The `signature` field should be replaced by a valid signature.

404.description: An attestation could not be created for the specified slot.

post.description:
Submit a signed attestation to the beacon node to be validated and submitted if valid.

This endpoint does not protected against slashing. Signing the attestation can result in a slashable offence.

204.description: The Attestation was accepted, validated, and submitted

get.summary: Create and return an unsigned beacon block at the specified slot.
get.description: Create and return an unsigned beacon block at the specified slot. The `randao_reveal` and `slot` must be provided to create the block.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UnsignedLong` Slot in which to create the beacon block.

parameters.name: randao_reveal
parameters.description: `BLSSignature Hex` BLS12-381 signature for the current epoch.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

post.summary: Get the validator duties for the specified epoch.
post.description:
Returns the validator duties for validators that match the specified public keys and epoch.

Public keys that do not match a validator are returned without validator information.

200.description: List of validators, including information about a validator's attestation committee index and block proposal slot.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.
